title: Bug 7581: ComboBoxCellEditor sizing issue in Property Sheet
description: From ECJoe Winchester <JoeWin@us.ibm.com wrote in message news:3C407F76.31A82113@us.ibm.com...
OB: The ComboBoxCellEditor does not size correctly in the property sheet. When a string in the editor is wider than the width of the property sheet column, the combo box grows to the width of the largest item. Consequently, the drop-down button may extend beyond the visible area of the property sheet, getting clipped.
EB: The ComboBoxCellEditor in the property sheet should handle wider strings gracefully, ensuring that the drop-down button remains within the visible area of the property sheet. Users should not need to widen the property sheet view to access the combo drop-down button.
SR:
To reproduce the issue:
1. Open the PropertySheetViewer.
2. Edit an object with ComboBoxCellEditor in column two.
3. Include strings in the editor wider than the width of the property sheet column.
4. Observe the drop-down button position, possibly extending beyond the visible area.
